text: The Exchange Square is the main headquarters of Bursa Malaysia, also known as the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange. It is located on Jalan Raja Chulan in Kuala Lumpur. This neoclassical building was officially opened on July 13, 1997, by Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. Category:Buildings and structures in Kuala Lumpur
title: Exchange Square (Kuala Lumpur)
